Totalne jebnuta hra. Strary engine. Nakokot komunita. Toxicky ludia. Kazda druha hra cheater. Po update, ktory mal optimalizovat hru, je to nakokot. FPS dropy na dennom poriadku. Namiesto noveho enginu prida Volvo novu operaciu a skiny, aby si zase namastili kapsy. Ale inak super. Uzivam si tu hru. Nemohol by som bez nej zit...

Welcome to CS:GO
where everyone who is better than you is a hacker
and everyone who is worse is a noob.

How about we introduce the cast:
the сука блять
the bottom fragger
the totally not a smurf
the i knew you were there cause of info
the low trust factor you get from playing too good on low ranks even though it was CS:GO WHO PUT YOU THERE ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
the turk turk turk turk turk turk tanana.

join CS:GO today and experience what it feels like to:
wait 15 minutes for a match
get screamed at for not wining that 1v5
open cases and hoping for a knife(you wont get it don't try)
fight hackers through toxicity
get low rank then be called hacker for it

so what are you waiting for? now that cs:go is free everyone with a hack they bought on some shady site can play cs!
